newsitem.title: USA: CME cattle and pork complex pre-opening calls.
newsitem.headline: CME cattle and pork complex pre-opening calls.

text.p: CME cattle and pork complex pre-opening calls as of 0805 CST.
LIVE CATTLE - Steady to off 0.100 cent. Slow live trade and uneven boxed beef market.
FEEDER CATTLE - Steady. Little change in index and corn futures called steady.
LEAN HOGS - Steady to off 0.200 cent. Further profit taking seen and cash hogs lower, but Taiwan still in background along with quarterly Hogs and Pigs report.
PORK BELLIES - Off 0.250 to up 0.250 cent. Carryover possible on weak cash but out-of-town mildly bullish.
